className.description: Classes applied to the shell for positioning purposes

disabled.description: Sets the disabled state of the input

id.description: Id applied to the input, used for the for attribute on the label

invalid.description: Set component when input is invalid

label.description: Optional label to float above input, placeholder will not show when using this

placeholder.description: Placeholder for the input, do not supply with a floating label

resize.description: Allows a multiline input to be resized

required.description: Add asterik to supplied label, aria-required

size.description: Set the size of the input

suggestion.description: Text to suggest as completion of the input
